about_the_game:
Forget swords and axes. Here, the battles take place in the minds of the heroes: cute monks and elderly folks with one goal: to meditate!

But it won’t be easy. Stress, bills, heartbreaks, and other enemies will try to disturb our heroes.

Your weapon is music!

Build a deck of cards to prevent the enemies from reaching the monks' peace. Collect relics to increase your powers. And play your instrument until you reach 100% serenity and win all the mental battles!


There are several hand-drawn scenarios! And like a good roguelike deckbuilder, reaching the end will require skill in combining the right cards and relics and choosing the right paths on the map!

  • 100+ different relics and curses
  • 100+ different cards
  • 4 different characters and counting, each playing a different instrument
  • dozens of beautiful scenarios
  • 30+ different enemies to disturb the monks
  • soundtrack exclusively composed for the game
  • a map with always random events, making each run different!
  • all the art hand-drawn by professional human illustrators

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c

short_description: Bills? Stress? Heartbreak? Find your inner peace in this roguelike deckbuilder where cute musical monks meditate atop mountain peaks. Each one plays a different instrument, and with the right mix of cards and relics you collect, you can use their music to banish your troubles.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
